alert.note: Alert for Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Natrona County Lower Elevations (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued December 12 at 7:13PM MST until December 14 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM MST MONDAY THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. Wind gusts on Outer Drive and in the Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range up to 75 mph are possible. * WHERE...Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range and Natrona County Lower Elevations. This includes Interstate 25, Highway 220, and Highway 20 26. * WHEN...From 5 AM MST Monday through 11 PM MST Tuesday night. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Natrona County Lower Elevations
